summary:
### **Monthly Operating Report (May 2025) – Key Material Information**  

#### **Retail Segment**  
- **Mass market electricity & gas sales**: 365 GWh (vs. 413 GWh in May 2024).  
- **Mass market netback**: **$145.13/MWh** (vs. $130.41/MWh in May 2024).  

#### **Wholesale Segment**  
- **Contracted wholesale electricity sales**: 768 GWh (vs. 778 GWh in May 2024).  
- **Electricity & steam net revenue**: **$169.49/MWh** (vs. $163.31/MWh in May 2024).  
- **Unit generation cost (incl. acquired)**: **$49.26/MWh** (vs. $61.80/MWh in May 2024).  

#### **Project Updates**  
- **Te Huka 3 project progress**: **99.7%** (vs. target of 100%).  
- **BESS project progress**: **70%** (vs. target of 79%).  

#### **Market & Pricing Data**  
- **Otahuhu futures settlement price (Q3 2025)**: **$182.25/MWh** (down from $199/MWh on 30 May 2025).  
- **South Island hydro storage**: 87% of mean (vs. North Island 139%).  

#### **Key Financial Metrics**  
- **Customer netback (retail)**: **$145.13/MWh** (up YoY).  
- **Derivative gains/(losses)**: **+$0.64m** (May 2025), but **−$16.42m** for 11-month period.  

No material capital markets announcements or structural changes identified.
